mapper.insert: insert into questionObj ( id, content, forComment, questionType, itemA, itemB, itemC, itemD, answer, occurTime ) values ( seq_for_questionObj.nextval, #{obj.content}, #{obj.forComment}, #{obj.questionType}, #{obj.itemA}, #{obj.itemB}, #{obj.itemC}, #{obj.itemD}, #{obj.answer}, sysdate )
